publication.abstract: The discussion about the future of hypertext made me wonder whether I could find another reason to consider a text to be 'hyper'. publication.title: An Infrastructure to Manage Resources
publication.abstract: One of the more diuse problems with information technol- ogy (IT) is that both users and their IT-supporters and IT-administrators have the feeling that IT leads to more work to be done.
